alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 17 at 3:59AM AKST until November 17 at 11:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range, Upper Koyukuk Valley, Dalton Highway Summits and Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 11 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off late this morning. Very light snow will continue into this evening but there will be little accumulation after noon today.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley
